item.description:

item.title: LIVE Artist Showcase for Auxy community.
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
In NYC, this isn’t a whack idea. I commute to the city strictly for work so I’m out, I believe others have done something similar.

I know chillin in a cafe holding a phone playing music sounds weird but I promise in NYC, the Mecca of weirdest crap I’ve ever seen, this is actually more NORMAL than it seems

Read full topic
item.source: LIVE Artist Showcase for Auxy community.

item.title: LIVE Artist Showcase for Auxy community.
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
lol yeah. auxy doesn’t require/support any legit gear, so it would look weird to hold your phone in the corner of a cafe. heck, pubs would be nearly impossible too because almost all of us are kids haha.
